text: pannaalaal ke lie dillee naee jagah nahin thee
naukaree ke dauraan bhee kaee baar vah dillee aa chuka tha aur naukaree ke baad bhee
pichhalee baar vah varsh bhar pahale hee aaya tha priya ke saath
priya ko preemaideekal kee pareeksha denee thee
aur dillee jaisee jagah mein vah raajendr nagar mein apane kisee puraane mitr ke ghar thahara tha
aur vaheen se agale din priya ke saath maulaana aajaad medeekal kolej tak gaya tha
dillee ka vahee ilaaka dekha hua tha usaka
maadalataun kee or jaane ka yah pannaalaal ka pahala avasar tha
saath mein nirmala thee
ramesh ne use achchhee tarah samajha diya tha ki baahar nikalate hee unhen seedhee bas mil jaegee
vyarth mein vah kisee skootarataiksee ke chakkar mein na pad jaen
aur pannaalaal ne bhee yahee kiya
bas adde se nikalakar unhonne mudrika bas pakad lee
bas mein achchhee khaasee bheed thee aur ve donon dheeredheere khisakate hue aage draeevaraseet ke paas aakar khade ho gae
peechhe kee seeton par baithe kisee bhee yaatree ne unakee umr ka khyaal karake unhen seet nahin dee
sabase aage kee seet par ek navayuvatee baithee thee
vahee unhen dekhakar khadee ho gaee
tab pannaalaal ne nirmala ko vahaan baith jaane ko kaha
krtagyata se use dekhatee huee nirmala seet par baith gaee
vah kaaphee thakee huee thee
usee ladakee kee or dekhate hue vah bolee aao betee tum bhee baith jao mere saath
naheennaheen aap baithe rahie
mujhe bas thodee door tak jaana hai
us navayuvatee ne nirmala se kaha
kahaan tak jaana hai betee kya modal taun tumhaare raaste mein aaega
mujhe modalataun hee jaana hai
us ladakee ne kaha
tab pannaalaal aur nirmala donon hee khush ho gae
chalo tab to achchha hai betee hamen bhee vaheen jaana hai
alpana sinema ke paas
main aapako bata doongee
phir kuchh rukakar bolee  aap kahaan se aa rahe hain
deharaadoon se
shaayad pahalee baar aae hain
haan yahee samajho
isake baad un donon mein aur baat nahin huee
modal taun aaya to us ladakee ne unhen bhee utar jaane ko kaha
saamaan ke naam par pannaalaal ke paas keval ek baig tha
jise haath mein lie vah nirmala va us ladakee ke peechhepeechhe bas se utar gaya
tab us ladakee ne unase ghar ka nambar poochha aur unhen ghar tak pahuncha diya
ghar par sabhee ko unakee hee prateeksha thee
pannaalaal va nirmala ne jaise hee ghar mein pravesh kiya saamane unhen ramesh kumaar khada dikha
unakee aahat par hee vah baahar aa gaya tha
namaskaar jee
haath jodate hue vah bola svaagat hai aapaka
aaeee
aur aage badhakar usane pannaalaal se haath milaaya
tab tak bheetar se ramesh kumaar ke vrddh pita va maan bhee aa gae the
sabhee ka aapas mein abhivaadan hua aur unheen ke saath draeeng room mein aa gae
pal bhar mein ghar ke sabhee log vahaan aa chuke the
amit va dev bhee
karnal mohan kumaar dillee mein nahin the
na hee unakee patnee
maalatee ne pravesh kiya tre lie usamen sharabat ke gilaas the
un donon ko namaste ke saath usane kaha ghar mein sabhee theek honge
veena kaisee hai
sab kushalamangal hain
pannaalaal ne kaha
aap aaraam karenge thoda dev ke pita shree raam ne unase poochha
naheennaheen aaraam kee aavashyakata nahin mahasoos ho rahee
itana saphar karane kee to aadat hai hamaaree
narm svar mein kaha pannaalaal ne
paanchachhah ghante to lage honge phir poochha shree raam ne
poore chhah ghante lag gae
subah chhah baje kee bas pakadee thee ham logon ne
hamen to us taraph jaane ka avasar hee nahin mila kabhee
tab maan krshna ne kaha
ab to sambandh ban gae hain
aanaajaana laga hee rahega
kaha nirmala ne
bhagavaan sukh karen
yah aksar kahatee thee krshna
shaayad bhagavaan par adhik vishvaas tha use
eeshvar to jo karata hai achchha hee karata hai bahan jee
shesh vyakti ko apane karmon par vishvaas hona chaahie
pannaalaal jo niyam se eevar kee aaraadhana karata tha
apane eeshvar prem se parichay karavaaya usane
ramesh kumaar va dev mahasoos kar rahe the ki baat bujurgon kee chal rahee hai
jo bina chhor ke aage badhatee rahegee
tab ramesh kumaar ne baatacheet ka vishay badalate hue kaha eeshvar ne hee sanjog
banaaya tha dev aur veena ka tabhee dekhie aap kahaan the aur ham kahaan
aaj ham logon ke beech ek atoot rishta kaayam ho chuka hai
aur phir bola  baaboojee ne poochh liya hai pandit se
usane nau pharavaree kee taareekh nikaalee hai
aap bataie aapake pandit ne koee aur shubh mahoort bataaya hai
aapane poochh liya vahee kaaphee hai
pannaalaal ne kaha
is par ramesh ne kaha tab theek hai nau pharavaree ko ham log shaam tak pahunch jaenge
raat phere dilavaakar das kee subah vaapis aa jaenge
tab nirmala ne kaha krshna se bahan jee aapake reetirivaajon ka hamen kuchh adhik nahin pata
thoda kuchh bata deejie
abhee krshna kuchh kahatee ki dev bol utha koee reetirivaaj nahin hain
bas ham paanch log aaenge shaanti se aur hamen kuchh chaahie bhee nahin
shaanti se nahin beta
deharaadoon mein jab se hamane ghar banaaya hai yah hamaare ghar kee pahalee shaadee hai
suneeta kee shaadee hamane himaachal mein hee kee thee
saaree rishtedaaree jo vahaan hai
ab veena kee shaadee kaise sab chuppee se ho jae
yah theek nahin lagata
aap ghar ke log hee aaen koee baat nahin
vaise achchha lagata ki baaraat aatee
phir bhee meree praarthana hai baindabaaja aae
chalie aapakee baat rahegee
shesh hamen kuchh nahin chaahie
ramesh kumaar ne nirnayaatmak svar mein kah diya
aur hamaaree koee maang nahin hai
aapane jo dena hai apanee betee ko dena hai
krshna ne kaha vaise hamaare mein sab bhaeebahan ke kapade hote hain
sabhee rishtedaaron abhee krshna isase aage kuchh kahatee ki dev ne tanik aavesh mein kaha  kuchh nahin hota hamaare mein
na bhaeebahan ka na mera na hee kisee rishtedaar ka
phir maan ke aamukh hokar bola  mammee aap samajhatee kyon nahin mujhe
mujhe koee bhee lenaden dikhaava pasand nahin hai
dev kee baat sunakar pannaalaal va nirmala ko mahasoos hua ki dev ke shabdon mein kathorata thee adiga the shabd usake  jinhen koee na badal saka
aur maan ab khisiyaasee gaee bolee mera aisa to matalab na tha
bahan jee ne poochha mainne kaha
aisa kahana aur jataana ek hee baat hai
maan in baaton ko rishton ke beech na laie
dev ne kuchh is tarah kaha ki jaise ishaara kiya ho usane is baat ko yaheen samaapt karane ka
tab ramesh kumaar ne samajhadaaree dikhaee aur maalatee ko kaha bhee khaane kee taiyaaree karo
naheennaheen ramesh jee ham khaana nahin khaenge
khaana kyon nahin khaenge
aap to in puraanee vichaar dhaaraon ko na apanaie
nahin aisee baat nahin
to phir sankoch kaahe ka
ab yadi aapaka ghar hamaara hai to hamaara ghar bhee aap hee ka hai
is rishte mein sankoch nahin hona chaahie
khaane ke pashchaat pannaalaal va nirmala deharaadoon lautana chaahate the
lekin sabhee ne aagrahapoorvak unhen rok liya
nirmala kee bhee chaah thee ki dillee aaee hai to bachchon ke lie kuchh letee jae
usake man kee baat jaise amit ne padh lee ho
shaam kee chaay ke dauraan usee ne kaha tha  aantee aap bor ho rahee hain man hai to chalie aapako baajaar tak ghuma laoon
nirmala ne dekha usakee or
khush huee
achchha ladaka hai usake man kee baat samajh gaya hai
vaise vah sankochee svabhaav kee thee
tabhee to krshna se adhik baat nahin kar sakee thee abhee tak
ghar se baahar aakar use baaten karane kee apeksha baaten sunane mein maja aata tha
jab bhee ghar se baahar jaatee thee dherasee baaten sunakar hee aatee thee aur ghar lautakar sabhee bachchon ko ek kahaanee kee tarah piro kar vahee baaten sunaatee thee
tabhee sabhee bachche maan kee prateeksha mein aankhen bichhae baithe rahate the
maan ke bina ghar sabhee ko soona lagata tha
jaana to chaahatee hoon beta yadi tumhen takaleeph na ho
kuchh sankoch bhare lahaje mein kaha nirmala ne
to phir uthie taiyaar ho jaeee
abhee chalate hain
amit ko jaise munh maangee muraad mil gaee
lekin krshna ko yah sab achchha nahin laga
shaayad vah chaahatee thee ki nirmala ke saath vah baajaar jae
lekin vah aisa kuchh nahin kahana chaahatee thee ki jisase dev naaraaj ho jae
dev ka svabhaav hee kuchh aisa tha ki shuroo se hee ghar mein usase ya usake saamane koee bhee adhik nahin bolata tha
aise mein krshna ko manamasos kar rah jaana pada
amit kuchh hee der mein taiyaar hokar apanee motar saikil par nirmala ko bitha kar kamalaanagar kee taraph chal diya
vah nirmala par apana achchha prabhaav daalana chaah raha tha
usakee haardik ichchha thee ki nirmala usase usake baare mein kuchh poochhe usake vyaapaar ke baare mein poochhe
taaki vah use prabhaavit kar sake
lekin aisa kuchh nahin hua
nirmala baajaar mein ghoomate hue use bataatee rahee ki vah kya kuchh lena chaah rahee hai
amit usakee jaroorat
ke anusaar kisee na kisee dukaan par use lekar ja raha tha
nirmala ne priya ke lie ek svetar rajanee ke lie ek shaal geeta ke lie ek jodee saindal aur prem ke lie ek silk kee kameej khareedee
amit ne use priya kee svetar chunane mein adhik ruchee dikhaee nirmala ne bhee aisa mahasoos kiya
sab hans rahe the khilakhilaakar
ramesh dev pramod aur amit
draeeng room mein baithe the sabhee
saamane sabhee ke gilaas pade the
vhiskee se bhare
dev ke vivaah ke shubh mahoort kee khushee mana rahe the ve sab
dev ko mahasoos ho raha tha usake tanaav kee ghadiyaan
akelepan ke sabhee kshan ab samaapt hone ja rahe hain
vyaavahaarikajeevan mein jojo mushkilen usake saamane theen ve sab ab use lag raha tha na ke baraabar rah jaengee ek saathee ke aa jaane se
isee khushee mein aaj usane bhee jee bhar ke peene kee thaan rakhee thee
usane hee kya sabhee aaj dher saaree peena chaah rahe the
baahar mausam mein thandak thee aur bheetar baithe in sabhee ke shareeron ko sharaab ke ghoont garm kie ja rahe the
kamare ke ek kone mein rikaardapleyar baj raha tha
amit ka aadha dhyaan sabakee baaton mein aur aadha dhyaan rikordapleyar kee or tha
jabajab rikaard samaapt hota vah jhat se uthakar badal deta tha apanee pasand ka sunane ke lie
is baar jab rikord khatm hua to pramod bola amit se  ab ye halke gaanegajal chhodo amit koee bhadakeela gaana lagao
vo hai na tumhaare paas rikaard irapshan vahee lagao
pramod nashe mein jhoom raha tha van ve tikit main naachoonga aaj
aur amit ne abhee rikaard lagaaya bhee na tha ki vah apanee kursee se khada hokar apane man kee dhun par thirakane laga tha
amit ne raik se usakee pasand ka rikaard nikaal kar laga diya
phaast karo phaast halkee aavaaz se maja nahin aaega
aur amit ne aavaaz bhee tej kar dee
tab pramod jorajor se naachane laga tha
vah naach kya raha tha jhoom raha tha
lekin isee mein use aanand aa raha tha
shesh sabhee use aisa karate dekh kar hans rahe the
tabhee pramod ne amit kee taraph badhakar use bhee beech mein kheencha
chalo aao tum bhee mere saath daans karo
are itanee badee khushee ka din hai aaj
doktar saahab kee shaadee hai
aur vah jor se naachane laga
haahoo kee aavaaz nikaalate dekh kar pramod par sabhee hans rahe the
amit bhee usake saath usake saamane khada naach raha tha
kuchh der tak aise hee chalata raha
van ve tikit  samaapt hote hee ramesh ne sueen oopar utha dee aur kaha pramod se  maja aa gaya
aaj pramod tumhaara badhiya mood dekhakar
vaise kya khyaal hai ab khaane ke baare mein
khaana khaenge sabhee khaenge
pahale naacho sabhee
pramod rikaard kee aavaaz band ho jaane ke baavajood naach raha tha
naachenge bhaee pahale khaana kha lete hain
tab ramesh ne amit se kaha  jao
bhaabhee se bolo khaana laga den
jee achchha
aur amit uthakar baahar rasoee ghar kee taraph chala gaya
tab ramesh kumaar ne rikaard kee sueen neeche kar dee aur aavaaz kam kar dee
pramod ko bhee dev ne apane paas bitha liya tha
lekin pramod se baitha nahin gaya
vah dev kee god mein sir rakhakar let gaya
aaj phit ho gaya hai pramod
dev ne kaha aur ramesh kumaar kee or dekhane laga
aaj khush hai bahut
ramesh kumaar ne pramod kee or dekhate hue kaha
use lag raha tha pramod madahosh hai jaise
lekin ramesh kee baat sunate hee usane apana sir uthaakar kaha  khush kyon na hooon mere yaar kee shaadee pakkee ho gaee hai
mere lie ye sabase achchhee khabar hai
phir kuchh ruk kar bola  ab to roj jashn chalega
kal main paartee doonga
aur phir pramod ne dev ke gaalon ko choom liya
vah bahut khush tha
